column4: scked after 30 boots. and fsck went crazy.. I cannot boot, I am running a live CD on the same computer. I REALLY need help. Fsck keeps exiting with exit status 4 and not resolving any issues
can I do it from the live cd? just terminal fsck -yf /dev/sda4?
